CHAT.comment: FEDERAL COMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION, ET AL., Petitioners v. FOX TELEVISION STATIONS, INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. GREGORY G. GARRE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. GREGORY G. GARRE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:05 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
